org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data

Class ACAQDataSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data.ACAQDataSlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableModel

    public class ACAQDataSlot
extends Object
implements TableModel
    A data slot holds an ACAQData instance. Slots are part of an ACAQAlgorithm
